SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , '' AS TEMP_CHECKLIST_ID , A.CHECKLIST_ID , A.STAGE_CD , A.USE_YN , A.ACT_STIME , A.ACT_ETIME , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.LMOD_SDATE , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT , B.CNT FROM PJ_CHECKLIST A, ( SELECT CHECKLIST_ID, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM PJ_CHECKITEM GROUP BY CHECKLIST_ID ) B
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CHECKLIST_ID = B.CHECKLIST_ID(+)
ORDER BY A.CHECKLIST_ID

SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , '' AS TEMP_CHECKLIST_ID , A.CHECKITEM_ID , A.CHECKLIST_ID , A.CHECKITEM_CD , A.ORD_NO , A.CHECKITEM_NM , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.LMOD_SDATE , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT
FROM PJ_CHECKITEM A
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CHECKLIST_ID = #{CHECKLIST_ID}
ORDER BY A.CHECKITEM_ID
